name: Blood Pudding
description: It's bloody tasty.

name: Blueberries
location: Found in bushes in the Black Forest
description: Tiny but tasty.

name: Bread
description: A tasty loaf of bread.

name: Carrot
location: Plant Carrot Seeds
description: An orange treat.

name: Carrot Soup
description: A warm tasty soup made of mostly carrots.

name: Cloudberries
location: Found in the Plains
description: The gold of the forest.

name: Cooked Fish
location: Cook Raw fish
description: A tasty side of smoked fish.

name: Cooked Lox Meat
location: Cook Lox meat
description: A great hunk of tender meat, food fit for Valhalla!

name: Cooked Meat
location: Cook Raw meat
description: Roasted on the bone, fit for a feast.

name: Cooked Serpent Meat
location: Cook Serpent meat
description: A cooked slice of sea serpent, smells good.

name: Fish Wraps
description: Bread and fish, what more to wish?

name: Grilled Neck Tail
location: Cook Neck tail
description: This savoury, charcoal-grilled meat has a slight aroma of seaweed and grass.

name: Honey
location: Found in Beehives
description: Sweet and tasty.

name: Lox Meat Pie
description: Break the crust to release a cloud of fragrant steam. Delicious!
recipe: 4 Barley flour 2 Cloudberries 2 Cooked Lox meat

name: Mushroom
location: Found on the ground in the Meadows and Black Forest
description: Bounty of the forest.

name: Queens Jam
description: That classic tasty blend of raspberries and blueberries.

name: Raspberries
location: Found in bushes in the Meadows
description: Sweet and delicious.

name: Sausages
description: Links of savory, smoked meat.

name: Serpent Stew
description: Smells of honey and serpent.

name: Turnip Stew
description: Nutritious and restorative.

name: Yellow Mushroom
location: Found in the Burial Chambers, Troll caves, and Sunken Crypts
description: An energetic glowing mushroom.

name: Tasty Mead
location: Ferment Mead base: Tasty (x10 Honey, x10 Raspberries, x5 Blueberries) for two days
description: The nectar of the gods, divine mead.

name: Minor Healing Mead
location: Ferment Mead base: Minor healing (x10 Honey, x5 Blueberries, x5 Raspberries, x1 Dandelion) for two days
description: Restores health.

name: Medium Healing Mead
location: Ferment Mead base: Medium healing (x10 Honey, x4 Bloodbag, x10 Raspberries, x1 Dandelion) for two days
description: Restores health.

name: Minor Stamina Mead
location: Ferment Mead base: Minor stamina (x10 Honey, x10 Raspberries, x10 Yellow mushroom) for two days
description: Restores stamina.

name: Medium Stamina Mead
location: Ferment Mead base: Medium stamina (x10 Honey, x10 Cloudberries, x10 Yellow mushroom) for two days
description: Restores stamina.

name: Poison Resistance Mead
location: Ferment Mead base: Poison resistance (x10 Honey, x5 Thistle, x1 Neck tail, x10 Coal) for two days
description: Fortifies you against poison.

name: Frost Resistance Mead
location: Ferment Mead base: Frost resistance (x10 Honey, x5 Thistle, x2 Bloodbag, x1 Greydwarf eye) for two days
description: Protects against the cold.

name: Fire Resistance Barley Wine
location: Ferment Barley wine base: Fire resistance (x10 Barley, x10 Cloudberries) for two days
description: Fortifies you against fire.

name: Black Metal
location: Smelt Black Metal scraps in a Blast Furnace
description: A heavy bar of dark metal.

name: Black Metal Scrap
location: Dropped by Fuling, Fuling Berserker, Fuling Shaman
description: A twisted hunk of dark metal.

name: Bronze
description: A strong alloy of copper and tin.

name: Bronze Nails
description: Used in construction of ships and furniture.

name: Copper
location: Smelt Copper ore
description: A bar of pure copper ready to be worked.

name: Copper Ore
location: Mined from Copper deposit
description: Unrefined copper. Needs to be refined in a smelter.

name: Flametal
location: Smelt Flametal ore in a Blast Furnace
description: The pure, shimmering core of a meteorite.

name: Flametal Ore
location: Mined from Glowing Metal piles
description: Warm to the touch with glowing veins of strange metal. Needs to be refined in a smelter.

name: Iron
location: Smelted from Scrap Iron
description: A bar of pure iron ready to be worked.

name: Iron Nails
description: Needed for advanced construction projects.

name: Obsidian
location: Mined in the Mountains
description: Dark volcanic glass.

name: Scrap Iron
location: Mined from Muddy Scrap Piles Found in chests in the Sunken Crypts
description: It's old and rusty but can be used and smelted again.

name: Silver
location: Smelt Silver ore
description: A bar of pure silver ready to be worked.

name: Silver Ore
location: Mined from silver deposits in the Mountains
description: Unrefined silver. Needs to be refined in a smelter.

name: Tin
location: Smelt Tin ore
description: A bar of pure tin ready to be worked.

name: Tin Ore
location: Mined from tin deposits near the rivers in the Black Forest
description: Unrefined tin. Needs to be refined in a smelter.

name: Ancient Bark
location: Harvested from Ancient Trees in the Swamp
description: An ancient and sturdy material.

name: Ancient Seed
location: Dropped by Greydwarf Brute and Greydwarf Shaman Can be found randomly in chests
description: Held against your ear, you hear tiny whispering within...

name: Bone Fragments
location: Dropped by Skeletons Found in the Burial Chambers and Black Forest
description: A pile of shattered bones.

name: Chain
location: Dropped by Wraiths Found in Sunken Crypts
description: A link of iron chain.

name: Chitin
location: Acquired by mining Abyssal Barnacles in the Ocean
description: A shard of crustacean shell.

name: Coal
location: Created by overcooking meat Crafted in a charcoal kiln using wood Dropped by Surtlings
description: A lump of coal.

name: Crystal
location: Dropped by Stone Golems in the Mountains
description: A shard of crystal from deep within the earth.

name: Deer Hide
location: Dropped by Deer Found in chests
description: A cleaned hide from a deer.

name: Dragon Tear
location: Dropped by Modor
description: The last frozen tears of a dragon, pulsating with mysterious energy.

name: Entrails
location: Dropped by Draugr
description: A slimy length of something's insides.

name: Feathers
location: Dropped by Seagulls Found in chests in the Meadows and Black Forest Rare drop from chopping down trees
description: A small pile of feathers.

name: Flint
location: Found along the river and shoreline in the Meadows
description: Can be shaped into sharp blades.

name: Freeze Gland
location: Dropped by Drakes
description: This mysterious organ keeps a perfect temperature.

name: Fuling Totem
location: Found in Fuling Villages Dropped by Fuling Berserker
description: Channels the ancient power of Yagluth.

name: Greydwarf Eye
location: Dropped by Greyling, Greydwarf, Greydwarf Brute, and Greydwarf Shaman.
description: Milky eyeball of a Greydwarf.

name: Guck
location: Found in Gucksacks in the Swamp
description: It smells like fermented fish.

name: Hard Antler
location: Dropped by Eikthyr
description: A piece of very hard antler.

name: Leather Scraps
location: Dropped by Boar Found in muddy scrap piles Found in chests in the Meadows
description: A small pile of leather scraps.

name: Linen Thread
description: A fine linen thread made out of a strong flax filament.

name: Lox Pelt
location: Dropped by Lox
description: A heavy pelt of thick, musty fur.

name: Needle
location: Dropped by Deathsquito
description: The pointy end of a Deathsquito.

name: Ooze
location: Dropped by Blob and Oozer
description: Rotten and putrid-smelling. Why do you want this?

name: Resin
location: Dropped by Greydwarfs
description: Sticky tree resin that insulates well. If put to the flame it burns slow and steady.

name: Serpent Scale
location: Dropped by Serpents
description: The shiny metal-like scale from a sea serpent.

name: Stone
location: Found all over the ground Mined from rocks
description: It's a rock.

name: Surtling Core
location: Dropped by Surtlings Found in Burial Chambers
description: It throbs with inner heat.

name: Thistle
location: Found in the Black Forest and Swamp
description: Beatiful but prickly.

name: Troll Hide
location: Dropped by Trolls Found in chests in Black Forest
description: A thick and sturdy hide. This is why trolls are so hard to kill.

name: Wolf Fang
location: Dropped by Wolves
description: Still sharp.

name: Wolf Pelt
location: Dropped by Wolves
description: A pelt of shaggy fur.

name: Withered Bone
location: Found in muddy scrap piles Found in Sunken Crypts
description: A giant bone, knotted like old wood.

name: Ymir Flesh
location: Purchased from Haldor for 120 coins
description: The earthy remains of the giant Ymir.

name: Wood Arrow
description: An arrow of sharpened wood.

name: Flinthead Arrow
description: A hide-breaker with a head of flint.

name: Bronzehead Arrow
description: Sharper than flint, a sleek messenger of death.

name: Ironhead Arrow
description: Capped with iron and flighted with dark feathers.

name: Obsidian Arrow
description: A sliver of darkness.

name: Needle Arrow
description: The final stitch.

name: Fire Arrow
description: This arrow burns whatever it pierces.

name: Frost Arrow
description: A shard of piercing ice.

name: Poison Arrow
description: A bitter sting from afar.

name: Silver Arrow
description: A needle to calm restless spirits.

name: Sharpening Stone
description: A whetstone wheel ready to spin.

name: Workbench
notes: Workbenches must be roofed and 70%+ enclosed. Placing a chopping block, tanning rack, adze, or tool shelf within 2m of the workbench will upgrade the workbench level by 1.
description: Used for crafting and building

name: Chopping Block
notes: Upgrades a workbench when placed within 2m.
description: Workbench Improvement

name: Tanning Rack
notes: Upgrades a workbench when placed within 2m.
description: Workbench Improvement
recipe: 10 Wood 15 Flint 20 Leather scraps 5 Deer hide

name: Adze
notes: Upgrades a workbench when placed within 2m. Must be placed near a forge.
description: Workbench Improvement

name: Tool Shelf
notes: Upgrades a workbench when placed within 2m. Must be placed near a forge.
description: Workbench Improvement

name: Forge
notes: Forges must be roofed and 70%+ enclosed. Placing a Forge cooler, Anvils, Smith's anvil, Forge toolrack, Forge bellows, or Grinding wheel within 2m of the forge will upgrade the forge level by 1.
description: Used for crafting and building

name: Forge Cooler
description: Forge Improvement

name: Anvils
description: Forge Improvement

name: Forge Toolrack
description: Forge Improvement

name: Smith's Anvil
description: Forge Improvement

name: Forge Bellows
description: Forge Improvement

name: Grinding Wheel
notes: Requires a stonecutter
description: Forge Improvement

name: Charcoal Kiln
notes: Converts every 16s with a max storage capacity of 25 pieces of wood. Cannot be placed on wood.
description: Creates coal from wood

name: Smelter
notes: Converts every 165s
description: Converts ore to metal

name: Blast Furnace
notes: Converts black metal scrap and flametal ore. Holds 10 ores and 20 coal. Uses 1 coal per 15s and converts 1 ore every 31s. Cannot be placed on wood.
description: Converts rare ore to metal
recipe: 20 Stone 5 Surtling core 10 Iron 20 Fine wood

name: Cauldron
notes: Requires a heat source underneath.
description: Brews mead base + various foods

name: Fermenter
notes: Fermenting takes 2 in-game-days
description: Brews mead base + various foods

name: Stonecutter
description: Craft stone items + structures

name: Artisan Table
notes: Allows construction of the Spinning Wheel, Windmill, and Blast furnace
description: Unlock advanced structures

name: Windmill
notes: Converts Barley into Barley flour. Holds up to 50 Barley and produces 20 Flour. Conversion speed depends on wind speed, and converts rapidly in storm conditions.
description: Converts barley

name: Spinning Wheel
notes: Converts Flax to Linen thread. Each Flax requires 30 seconds to convert. Max capacity: 40 Flax.
description: Converts Flax
recipe: 20 Fine wood 10 Iron nails 5 Leather scraps

name: Stone Axe
description: A crude axe for tree-felling

name: Flint Axe
description: Sharper than stone.

name: Bronze Axe
description: A bright and burnished blade, curved like a smile.

name: Iron Axe
description: Sharp and strong, a woodcutter's friend.

name: Blackmetal Axe
description: A perfectly-balanced axe forged from dark metal with an emerald sheen.
recipe: 6 Fine wood 20 Black metal 5 Linen thread

name: Antler Pickaxe
description: This tool is hard enough to crack even the most stubborn rocks.

name: Bronze Pickaxe
description: A good bronze pick. Can break very hard rocks.

name: Iron Pickaxe
description: A sturdy tool of hardened iron.

name: Hammer
description: With this to your hand, you can raise high halls and mighty fortifications.

name: Hoe
description: A farmer's tool for working the earth.

name: Cultivator
description: A farming tool for tilling soil.

name: Fishing Rod
location: Not craftable. Must purchase from Haldor for 350 coins.
description: Stand issue dvergr fishing rod .

name: Torch
description: It brings light and warmth, drives back the darkness.

name: Rag Tunic
description: Better than nothing.

name: Rag Pants
description: A simple remedy for nudity.

name: Leather Helmet
description: A hood of toughened leather.

upgrades.recipe: Leather Helmet (I) 6 Deer hide 5 Bone fragments
Leather Helmet (II) 12 Deer hide 10 Bone fragments
Leather Helmet (III) 18 Deer hide 15 Bone fragments

name: Leather Tunic
description: A tunic made from animal hide.

upgrades.recipe: Leather Tunic (I) 6 Deer hide 5 Bone fragments
Leather Tunic (II) 12 Deer hide 10 Bone fragments
Leather Tunic (III) 18 Deer hide 15 Bone fragments

name: Leather Pants
description: They squeak a little when you walk.

upgrades.recipe: Leather Pants (I) 6 Deer hide 5 Bone fragments
Leather Pants (II) 12 Deer hide 10 Bone fragments
Leather Pants (III) 18 Deer hide 15 Bone fragments

description: Rustic chic.

upgrades.recipe: Deer Hide Cape (I) 4 Deer hide 5 Bone fragments
Deer Hide Cape (II) 8 Deer hide 10 Bone fragments
Deer Hide Cape (III) 12 Deer hide 15 Bone fragments

name: Troll Leather Helmet
description: Trollskin is hard to work but makes exceptional armor.

name: Troll Leather Tunic
description: Trolls are hard to skin but their leather is tough and warm.

name: Troll Leather Pants
description: Leggings of tough troll hide.

name: Troll Hide Cape
description: Trollskin is tough and supple.

upgrades.recipe: Troll Hide Cape (I) 5 Troll hide 5 Bone fragments
Troll Hide Cape (II) 10 Troll hide 10 Bone fragments
Troll Hide Cape (III) 15 Troll hide 15 Bone fragments

name: Bronze Helmet
description: This will help to keep your brains inside your skull.

name: Bronze Plate Cuirass
description: A breastplate of hammered bronze.

name: Bronze Plate Leggings
description: Bronze greaves to sheild your legs.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A helm of polished iron, fit for a hero.

name: Iron Scale Mail
description: An iron scale mail , this will turn all but the strongest of blows.

name: Iron Greaves
description: Iron greaves to protect your legs.

name: Drake Helmet
description: An elaborate and finely-crafted helm.

name: Wolf Armor Chest
notes: Provides protection from cold, freezing, and front damage in the Mountain Biome. Cold protectioin does not stack. This passive is diabled when wet.
description: A wolfskin jerkin, warm and wild-looking. It protects against the cold.

upgrades.recipe: Wolf Armor Chest (I) 5 Silver 2 Wolf pelt
Wolf Armor Chest (II) 10 Silver 4 Wolf pelt
Wolf Armor Chest (III) 15 Silver 6 Wolf pelt

name: Wolf Armor Legs
description: Shaggy breeches of wolfskin.

upgrades.recipe: Wolf Armor Legs (I) 5 Silver 2 Wolf pelt 1 Wolf fang
Wolf Armor Legs (II) 10 Silver 4 Wolf pelt 2 Wolf fang
Wolf Armor Legs (III) 15 Silver 6 Wolf pelt 3 Wolf fang

name: Wolf Fur Cape
notes: Provides protection from cold, freezing, and front damage in the Mountain Biome. Cold protectioin does not stack. This passive is diabled when wet.
description: Wolves are natural survivors. This one was just unlucky. Now its pelt will warm you in the snow.

upgrades.recipe: Wolf Fur Cape (I) 4 Wolf pelt 2 Silver
Wolf Fur Cape (II) 8 Wolf pelt 4 Silver
Wolf Fur Cape (III) 12 Wolf pelt 6 Silver

name: Padded Helmet
description: A snug fit, finely made.

name: Padded Cuirass
description: Finely wrought and strong enough to turn even the sharpest blades.

name: Padded Greaves
description: Expertly crafted leg protection.

name: Linen Cape
description: A simple traveler's cape.

name: Lox Cape
notes: Provides protection from cold, freezing, and front damage in the Mountain Biome. Cold protectioin does not stack. This passive is diabled when wet.
description: A pelt from one of the great beasts, thick and warm.

name: Cape of Odin
description: Odin's finest warriors deserve the finest cloth.

name: Hood of Odin
description: Odin's finest warriors deserve the finest cloth.

name: Dverger Circlet
location: Not craftable. Must purchase from Haldor for 620 coins.
description: A portable perpetual light source for the dungeon explorer.

name: Yule Hat
location: Not craftable. Must purchase from Haldor for 100 coins.
description: A red hat in the style of house gnomes.

name: Club
description: A crude but useful weapon.

name: Bronze Mace
description: A headache on a stick.

name: Iron Mace
description: A fist-sized lump of iron on a wooden shaft.

name: Porcupine
description: A deadly weapon, bristling with fiendish spikes.

upgrades.recipe: 5 Fine wood 20 Iron 5 Needle 10 Linen thread

name: Frostner
description: The dead fear silver. Remind them why.

upgrades.recipe: 10 Ancient bark 30 Silver 5 Ymir flesh 5 Freeze gland

name: Stagbreaker
description: A weapon worthy of the gods! If you get hit with this, you'll know it...

upgrades.recipe: 20 Core wood 5 Deer trophy 2 Leather scraps
Stagbreaker (I) 5 Core wood 2 Deer trophy 1 Leather scraps 10 Bone fragments
Stagbreaker (II) 10 Core wood 4 Deer trophy 2 Leather scraps 20 Bone fragments
Stagbreaker (III) 15 Core wood 6 Deer trophy 3 Leather scraps 30 Bone fragments

description: A mighty hammer , worthy of a champion.

name: Battleaxe
description: Skull-splitter, a warrior's joy.

name: Flint Knife
description: Sharpened flint, a reliable tool.

name: Copper Knife
description: A glittering copper knife .

name: Abyssal Razor
description: A knife from the deep.

description: A darkling blade, strong and sharp.

description: The straight line between life and death runs along the edge of this blade.

description: A thing of death and beauty, it catches the light with a greenish glow.

name: Bronze Atgeir
description: A true warrior's tool.

description: Blood-drinker, skull-cracker, death-bringer.

description: A vicious hewing-axe of almost unbreakable black metal.

description: If your eye marks a thing for death, let your arm send the messenger.

notes: Attacks will leash the target to the player. Further attacks will break the leash.
description: The ocean's wrath.

description: A crude but functional bow.

description: A shield of burnished bronze, good to turn a blade or two.

notes: Multiple styles are available for this shield when crafting.
description: Banded with hoops of iron, a true warrior's companion.

name: Silver Shield
notes: Multiple styles are available for this shield when crafting.
description: A shield of radiant silver.

notes: Multiple styles are available for this shield when crafting.

notes: Multiple styles are available for this shield when crafting.

notes: Multiple styles are available for this shield when crafting.

description: A tower shield of gleaming dark metal.

description: A sturdy shield of overlapping scales.

name: Bloodbag
location: Dropped by Leeches in the Swamp.
description: The contents of a leech. Ick!

name: Barley Flour
location: Crafted using Barley in the Windmill.
description: Great for baking bread.

name: Raw Meat
location: Dropped by Boar, Deer, Wolf
description: A raw piece of meat, cook it for a tasty treat.

name: Turnip
location: Carrots are grown by planting Turnip seeds (found in the Swamp) with the Cultivator.
description: A turnip.

name: Flax
location: Fuling villages.
description: Unspun fibers from a flax plant.

name: Wood
location: Branches, all Trees and Stumps, Greydwarf drops
description: Good strong wood to build with.

name: Drake Trophy
location: Found by killing Drakes in the Mountain biome.
description: Still cold to the touch.

name: Wolf Trophy
location: Dropped by Wolves in the Mountain biome
description: Frozen in death, the hair matted with blood and a silent howl lodged in its throat.

name: Fine Wood
location: Birch Tree, Oak Tree
description: High quality wood for fine carpentry.

name: Core Wood
location: Pine Tree
description: Perfect for building log cabins.

name: Deer Trophy
location: Deer
description: A fine specimen but you'll need to kill more than deer to enter Valhalla.

name: Draugr Elite Trophy
location: Draugr Elites in the Swamp biome
description: The dead stare of the glowing red eyes sends a shiver through your bones.
